snippet.title: [3DS]Adventure Bar Story[eShop]
snippet.description:
Adventure Bar Story
The bar management RPG arrives on Nintendo 3DS(TM) !

A tale of two sisters running their bar.
Go adventure and gather materials!

Make dishes and sell them at the bar!
Over 400 recipes included in the game!

Unique party members that battle with Siela!

Aim to be the top bar in the country!
---
Coming soon in Nintendo 3DS eShop!

(c) RideonJapan,Inc.
(c) Rideon,Inc.
